notes.importance: How important is this prompt to get right? Use low | normal | high | critical. Higher values should enable stronger grounding and anti-hallucination controls.
notes.think_deeply: yes | no. 'yes' adds a 'think deeply about this' directive. Use sparingly; limited budget.
notes.two_parter: yes | no. 'yes' signals a two-stage flow: initial paste, then follow-up refinement.
notes.reference_file_default: Optional absolute path used as initial default for reference file placeholders (will copy per template on first use).
